channel.title: Whonix / Kicksecure KVM 15.0.1.3.9 Released
channel.description:
**Changelog:**
* [moved to gitlab.com](https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-moving-from-github-to-gitlab/9676) * other platforms build fix * monero-gui can be uninstalled * /etc/resolv.conf fix * enable `export QMLSCENE_DEVICE=softwarecontext` also for KVM * upgrade to Whonix logo 2020 version * upgrade monero-gui
**Downloads:**
[Whonix](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Download_Whonix_.E2.84.A2)
[Kicksecure](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Kicksecure/KVM#Download_Kicksecure_.E2.84.A2)

item.title: Whonix / Kicksecure KVM 15.0.1.3.9 Released
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Changelog:

  • moved to gitlab.com
  • other platforms build fix
  • monero-gui can be uninstalled
  • /etc/resolv.conf fix
  • enable export QMLSCENE_DEVICE=softwarecontext also for KVM
  • upgrade to Whonix logo 2020 version
  • upgrade monero-gui

Downloads:

Whonix

Kicksecure
